逸れる: (はぐれる) - to lose sight of (one's companions)/to stray from; (after the -masu stem of a verb, sometimes as っぱぐれる) to miss (one's chance to ...)
逸を以て労を待つ: (いつをもってろうをまつ) - to wait for the enemy to tire at ease
逸品: (いっぴん) - article of rare beauty; gem
逸文: (いつぶん) - unknown or lost writings
逸早く: (いちはやく) - promptly/quickly/without delay; before others/first
逸楽生活: (いつらくせいかつ) - (yoji) a life given up to pleasure; pleasure-seeking lifestyle
逸物: (いちもち) - first-rate specimen; first-rate object; superb item; superb article; excellent thing; pick (e.g. of a litter); superb person; excellent person
逸言: (いつげん) - exaggeration; saying too much; verbal slip
逸走: (いっそう) - escape; scud; scamper away
逸速く: (いちはやく) - promptly/quickly/without delay; before others/first
逼る: (せまる) - to approach/to draw near/to be imminent; to press (someone for something)/to urge/to compel
逼塞: (ひっそく) - being blocked (and contained); reduced circumstances
遁す: (のがす) - to miss/to lose/to give away/to let go/to set free/to let get away; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to fail to ...
遁世: (とんせい) - seclusion from the world
遁世生活: (とんせいせいかつ) - (yoji) living in seclusion; retired from the world
遁法: (とんぽう) - Ninja art of escape
遁術: (とんじゅつ) - Ninja art of escape
遂げる: (togeru) - realizar; alcançar; cumprir; chegar a (um determinado resultado); chegar a; terminar com
遂せる: (おおせる) - (usu. aux. verb) to succeed in doing; to manage to do; to finish doing
遅い: (osoi) - slow, time-consuming, sluggish; late (durante o dia), towards the end (of the day or night), until a time far into the day or night , slow, time-consuming, sluggish; late (in the day), towards the end (of the day or night), until a time far into the day or night; later (than expected or usual), late, behind schedule, behind time, tardy, overdue, unpunctual; too late, having missed the boat
遅かりし由良之助: (おそかりしゆらのすけ) - to let a chance to do something slip through one's fingers
遅かれ早かれ: (おそかれはやかれ) - sooner or later
遅きに失する: (おそきにしっする) - to be too late (to be of use)
遅くとも: (おそくとも) - (ant: 早くとも) at the latest
遅す: (おくらす) - to retard; to delay
遅ばせながら: (おそればせながら) - belatedly; tardily
遅まき: (おそまき) - (ant: 早まき・はやまき) sowing late; doing late
遅らす: (おくらす) - to retard; to delay
遅らせる: (おくらせる) - to delay; to postpone; to put off; to slow down; to hold up; to retard; to put back (a clock)
遅れ: (okure) - atraso, demora, adiamento, ficar para trás
遅ればせながら: (おそればせながら) - belatedly; tardily
遅れる: (おくれる) - to be late; to be delayed; to fall behind schedule; to be overdue
遅れをとる: (おくれをとる) - to fall behind
遅れを取る: (おくれをとる) - to fall behind
遅れ馳せながら: (おそればせながら) - belatedly; tardily
遅レス: (おそレス) - slow response (to e-mail, etc.)
遅出: (おそで) - late attendance (e.g. at the office)
遅刻届: (ちこくとどけ) - report of late arrival; tardy slip
遅刻届け: (ちこくとどけ) - report of late arrival; tardy slip
遅効性肥料: (ちこうせいひりょう) - slow-acting fertilizer; slow-acting fertiliser
遅咲: (おそざき) - late blooming (flower, talent); late flowering
遅咲き: (おそざき) - late blooming (flower, talent); late flowering
遅場米: (おそばまい) - rice from a late harvest; late rice
遅延センシティブ: (ちえんセンシティブ) - delay sensitive
遅延変動センシティブ: (ちえんへんどうセンシティブ) - delay variation sensitive
遅延登録: (ちえんとうろく) - late registration; delayed registration
遅延証明書: (ちえんしょうめいしょ) - certificate of lateness (issued by a railroad company, etc.)
